item.title: Making max cape require all 99s to wear
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Well first off, for the for-loop, I’d use the ! operator. Second, for an if-else statement, there should be two distinct events that happen depending on whether the conditions are satisfied.

Read full topic

item.title: Making max cape require all 99s to wear
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

so i been playing around and heres what i came up with

	if (wearID == 12774) {
		for (int i = 0; i < 23; i++) {
			if (c.playerLevel[i] < 99) {
			return;
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need 99 in all skills to wear this item.");
		}
	}
}

but its still not requiring levels to wear and its not getting any errors, any suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Making max cape require all 99s to wear
